sqlMap.select: select ACCOUNT_NO, SUB_ACCOUNT_NO, BRANCH_ID, CURRENCY, DEPT_TYPE, BALANCE_CODE, ACC_ORG_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACC_TYPE, DEPOSIT_RATE, CUSTOM_TYPE, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DOCUMENT_NO, ACC_STATUS, LAST_BALANCE, DEBIT_COUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, CREDIT_COUNT, CREDIT_AMOUNT, BALANCE, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, CHK_ADD_WORD, OP_TYPE, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3 from FTZ_ACT_MSTR_TMP where ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR# and SUB_ACCOUNT_NO = #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from FTZ_ACT_MSTR_TMP where ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR# and SUB_ACCOUNT_NO = #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into FTZ_ACT_MSTR_TMP (ACCOUNT_NO, SUB_ACCOUNT_NO, BRANCH_ID, CURRENCY, DEPT_TYPE, BALANCE_CODE, ACC_ORG_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACC_TYPE, DEPOSIT_RATE, CUSTOM_TYPE, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DOCUMENT_NO, ACC_STATUS, LAST_BALANCE, DEBIT_COUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, CREDIT_COUNT, CREDIT_AMOUNT, BALANCE, MAK_USER_ID, MAK_DATETIME, CHK_USER_ID, CHK_DATETIME, CHK_ADD_WORD, OP_TYPE, RSV1, RSV2, RSV3) values (#accountNo:VARCHAR#, #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#, #branchId:VARCHAR#, #currency:CHAR#, #deptType:CHAR#, #balanceCode:CHAR#, #accOrgCode:VARCHAR#, #accountName:VARCHAR#, #accType:CHAR#, #depositRate:DECIMAL#, #customType:CHAR#, #documentType:CHAR#, #documentNo:VARCHAR#, #accStatus:CHAR#, #lastBalance:DECIMAL#, #debitCount:DECIMAL#, #debitAmount:DECIMAL#, #creditCount:DECIMAL#, #creditAmount:DECIMAL#, #balance:DECIMAL#, #makUserId:VARCHAR#, #makDatetime:VARCHAR#, #chkUserId:VARCHAR#, #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#, #chkAddWord:VARCHAR#, #opType:CHAR#, #rsv1:VARCHAR#, #rsv2:VARCHAR#, #rsv3:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update FTZ_ACT_MSTR_TMP set BRANCH_ID = #branchId:VARCHAR#, CURRENCY = #currency:CHAR#, DEPT_TYPE = #deptType:CHAR#, BALANCE_CODE = #balanceCode:CHAR#, ACC_ORG_CODE = #accOrgCode:VARCHAR#, ACCOUNT_NAME = #accountName:VARCHAR#, ACC_TYPE = #accType:CHAR#, DEPOSIT_RATE = #depositRate:DECIMAL#, CUSTOM_TYPE = #customType:CHAR#, DOCUMENT_TYPE = #documentType:CHAR#, DOCUMENT_NO = #documentNo:VARCHAR#, ACC_STATUS = #accStatus:CHAR#, LAST_BALANCE = #lastBalance:DECIMAL#, DEBIT_COUNT = #debitCount:DECIMAL#, DEBIT_AMOUNT = #debitAmount:DECIMAL#, CREDIT_COUNT = #creditCount:DECIMAL#, CREDIT_AMOUNT = #creditAmount:DECIMAL#, BALANCE = #balance:DECIMAL#, MAK_USER_ID = #makUserId:VARCHAR#, MAK_DATETIME = #makDatetime:VARCHAR#, CHK_USER_ID = #chkUserId:VARCHAR#, CHK_DATETIME = #chkDatetime:VARCHAR#, CHK_ADD_WORD = #chkAddWord:VARCHAR#, OP_TYPE = #opType:CHAR#, RSV1 = #rsv1:VARCHAR#, RSV2 = #rsv2:VARCHAR#, RSV3 = #rsv3:VARCHAR# where ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR# and SUB_ACCOUNT_NO = #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#

update FTZ_ACT_MSTR_TMP
ACC_STATUS = #accStatus:CHAR#
where ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR# and SUB_ACCOUNT_NO = #subAccountNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.sql:
where 1=1
and BRANCH_ID = #branchId#
and ACCOUNT_NAME like '%$accountName$%'
and ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo#
and SUB_ACCOUNT_NO = #subAccountNo#
and CURRENCY = #currency#
and ACC_TYPE = #accType#
and ACC_STATUS = #accStatus#
order by ACCOUNT_NO, SUB_ACCOUNT_NO
